title: Leaf-bladed battleaxe

properties.name: description
properties.value: The leaf-bladed battleaxe is one of three melee weapons used to harm turoths and kurasks, the others being the leaf-bladed spear and sword. When fighting these monsters with the battleaxe, it will have 17.5% increased accuracy and damage, and stacks with the Slayer helmet.

Item ID20727

The leaf-bladed battleaxe is one of three melee weapons used to harm turoths and kurasks, the others being the leaf-bladed spear and sword. When fighting these monsters with the battleaxe, it will have 17.5% increased accuracy and damage, and stacks with the Slayer helmet.

The axe requires an Attack level of 65 and a Slayer level of 55 to wield. It is dropped by kurasks, located in the Fremennik Slayer Dungeon and the Iorwerth Dungeon.

The leaf-bladed battleaxe has the highest strength bonus out of all one-handed melee weaponry, making it a decent KO weapon, especially when used with the Granite Maul. In addition, the leaf-bladed battleaxe has an attack speed of 5, rather than the 6 of other battleaxes.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
9 July 2020
(update)

An issue has been fixed where using the leaf-bladed battleaxe would cause a slight walk delay.

30 November 2017
(update | poll)
  • The leaf-bladed battleaxe's slash accuracy has been increased from +50 to +72.
  • A passive effect has been added where its accuracy and damage is increased by 17.5% when fighting turoths and kurask.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The attack animation of the battleaxe reuses the one that the various barbarian spirits found in the Ancient Cavern use (such as Angry barbarian spirit).

[[File:Leaf-bladed battleaxe detail.png|150px|left]]
The '''leaf-bladed battleaxe''' is one of three [[melee weapon]]s used to harm [[turoth]]s and [[kurask]]s, the others being the [[leaf-bladed spear]] and [[Leaf-bladed sword|sword]]. When fighting these monsters with the battleaxe, it will have 17.5% increased accuracy and damage, and stacks with the [[Slayer helmet]]. 

The axe requires an [[Attack]] level of 65 and a [[Slayer]] level of 55 to wield. It is dropped by [[kurask]]s, located in the [[Fremennik Slayer Dungeon]] and the [[Iorwerth Dungeon]].

The leaf-bladed battleaxe has the highest strength bonus out of all one-handed melee weaponry, making it a decent KO weapon, especially when used with the [[Granite Maul]]. In addition, the leaf-bladed battleaxe has an [[attack speed]] of 5, rather than the 6 of other battleaxes.
